title: Lot of (4) 1880s H804 Baseball Trade Cards $70/obo
author: Silverskulls

posts.post_title: Lot of (4) 1880s H804 Baseball Trade Cards $70/obo
posts.post_content:
Lot of (4) 1880s H804 Baseball Trade Cards including:

H804-2C 1888 “Vertical Brownies” "Out on Second" (flat hats, no front text variation)
H804-2C 1888 “Vertical Brownies” "A Panic-er" (flat hats, no front text variation)
H804-1B Tobin Lithograph Baby Talk “Baby Bunting”
Brownies Trade Card "Peas in a Pod"

$70/obo shipped for the lot.
